name: the terrific torus of the impenetrable palace
name_original: the terrific torus of the impenetrable palace
description:
All that stands between you and the item you desire more than life itself is a spike pit, some snakes, and a couple questionable directions...

Keyboard & Mouse Controls:

  • press w, a, s, d keys to move about
  • move mouse to look around
  • press space bar to hop
  • click left mouse button to hold the torus
  • hold right mouse button to take a closer look
  • hold e to close eyes

Credits:

Programming, design, and visuals by Daniel Russell (@dan_a_russell)
All audio by Scott Thompson

Developed for A BCIT Game Jam
